column16: N: Float dark rum on top
N:Originally made with cachaça instead of rum, also add sugar
N:You can also add sugar syrup
N:Pour grenadine slowly to make layers
N:Get a strong glass, hit on table before drinking
N:Can add slice of lemon/lime or slice of cucumber
N:Can add slice of lemon/lime or slice of cucumber
N: Pour grenadine slowly to make layers
N:Also add pepper, salt, Tabasco and possibly Worcestershire sauce
N:You can also add mint leaves and pomegranate seeds
N:You can also add a few lime peels
N:Replace vodka with Malibu for a special taste
N:Mix lime, lemon, water and sugar to substitute sweet & sour mix
